## [Situación Epidemiológica del Dengue en México & Morelos]{style="color:#003300;" .r-fit-text}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

```{r}

# step 1. load teh dengue dataset ####
load("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/automatic_read_sinave/8.RData/den/den2008_2024.RData")

# Step 2. aggregate the dengue dataset ####
x1 <- den2008_2015 |>
    dplyr::filter(VEC_EST == 2) |>
    #dplyr::filter(CVE_EDO == 17) |>
    dplyr::group_by(DES_EDO.x, DES_MPO.x, ANO) |>
    dplyr::summarise(n = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") |>
    dplyr::rename(mpo = DES_MPO.x, 
                  edo = DES_EDO.x,
                  year = ANO) 
# Step 2. aggregate the dengue dataset ####
y1 <- den2016_2024 |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == 2) |>
    #dplyr::filter(CVE_EDO_RES == 17) |>
    dplyr::group_by(DES_EDO_RES,DES_MPO_RES, ANO) |>
    dplyr::summarise(n = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") |>
    dplyr::rename(mpo = DES_MPO_RES ,
                  edo = DES_EDO_RES,
                   year = ANO) 

# Step 3. aggregated dataset ####
xy <- dplyr::bind_rows(x1, y1)


# mexico y morelos ####
ggplot2::ggplot() +
    ggplot2::geom_col(data = xy,
                       ggplot2::aes(x = year,
                                    y = n),
                      fill = "#04225CFF")  +
    ggplot2::geom_col(data = xy |> 
                          dplyr::filter(edo == "MORELOS"),
                      ggplot2::aes(x = year,
                                   y = n),
                      fill = "#DC3B34FF") +
    ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(from = 2008,
                                             to = 2024,
                                             by = 1)) +
    ggplot2::ylab("Casos de Dengue") +
    ggplot2::xlab("Años") 

```


## [Situación Epidemiológica del Dengue en Morelos & Tlaquiltenango]{style="color:#003300;" .r-fit-text}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

```{r}
# step 1. load teh dengue dataset ####
load("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/automatic_read_sinave/8.RData/den/den2008_2024.RData")

# Step 2. aggregate the dengue dataset ####
x1 <- den2008_2015 |>
    dplyr::filter(VEC_EST == 2) |>
    dplyr::filter(CVE_EDO == 17) |>
    dplyr::group_by(DES_EDO.x, DES_MPO.x, ANO) |>
    dplyr::summarise(n = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") |>
    dplyr::rename(mpo = DES_MPO.x, 
                  edo = DES_EDO.x,
                  year = ANO) 
# Step 2. aggregate the dengue dataset ####
y1 <- den2016_2024 |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == 2) |>
    dplyr::filter(CVE_EDO_RES == 17) |>
    dplyr::group_by(DES_EDO_RES,DES_MPO_RES, ANO) |>
    dplyr::summarise(n = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") |>
    dplyr::rename(mpo = DES_MPO_RES ,
                  edo = DES_EDO_RES,
                  year = ANO) 

# Step 3. aggregated dataset ####
xy <- dplyr::bind_rows(x1, y1)


# mexico y morelos ####
ggplot2::ggplot() +
    ggplot2::geom_col(data = xy,
                      ggplot2::aes(x = year,
                                   y = n),
                      fill = "#04225CFF")  +
    ggplot2::geom_col(data = xy |> 
                          dplyr::filter(mpo == "TLAQUILTENANGO"),
                      ggplot2::aes(x = year,
                                   y = n),
                      fill = "#DC3B34FF") +
    ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(from = 2008,
                                             to = 2024,
                                             by = 1)) +
    ggplot2::ylab("Casos de Dengue") +
    ggplot2::xlab("Años")
```


## [Situación Epidemiológica del Dengue en  Tlaquiltenango & Valle de Vazquez]{style="color:#003300;" .r-fit-text}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

```{r}
# step 1. load teh dengue dataset ####
load("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/automatic_read_sinave/8.RData/den/den2008_2024.RData")


# Step 2. aggregate the dengue dataset ####

x1 <- den2008_2015 |>
    dplyr::filter(VEC_EST == 2) |>
    dplyr::filter(CVE_EDO == 17) |>
    dplyr::filter(DES_MPO.x == "TLAQUILTENANGO") |>
    dplyr::group_by(DES_EDO.x, DES_MPO.x, DES_LOC,ANO) |>
    dplyr::summarise(n = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") |>
    dplyr::rename(mpo = DES_MPO.x, 
                  edo = DES_EDO.x,
                  loc = DES_LOC,
                  year = ANO) 
# Step 2. aggregate the dengue dataset ####
y1 <- den2016_2024 |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == 2) |>
    dplyr::filter(CVE_EDO_RES == 17) |>
    dplyr::filter(DES_MPO_RES == "TLAQUILTENANGO") |>
    dplyr::group_by(DES_EDO_RES,DES_MPO_RES,DES_LOC_RES, ANO) |>
    dplyr::summarise(n = dplyr::n(), .groups = "drop") |>
    dplyr::rename(mpo = DES_MPO_RES ,
                  edo = DES_EDO_RES,
                  loc = DES_LOC_RES,
                  year = ANO) 

# Step 3. aggregated dataset ####
xy <- dplyr::bind_rows(x1, y1)

# mexico y morelos ####
plotly::ggplotly(
ggplot2::ggplot() +
    ggplot2::geom_col(data = xy,
                      ggplot2::aes(x = year,
                                   y = n),
                      fill = "#04225CFF")  +
    ggplot2::geom_col(data = xy |> 
                          dplyr::filter(loc %in% c("VALLE DE VAZQUEZ (LOS HORNOS)",
                                                   "VALLE DE VÁZQUEZ (LOS HORNOS)")),
                      ggplot2::aes(x = year,
                                   y = n),
                      fill = "#DC3B34FF") +
    ggplot2::scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(from = 2008,
                                             to = 2024,
                                             by = 1)) +
    ggplot2::ylab("Casos de Dengue") +
    ggplot2::xlab("Años"))
```

## [Situación Epidemiológica del Dengue en Tlaquiletango]{style="color:#003300;" .r-fit-text}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

Casos Probables y Confirmados
```{r, out.width="100%", out.height="100%"}
load("/Users/fdzul/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/proyects/geocoding_mex/2024/8.RData/denmex_2024.RData")
densnv::mp_heatmap(locality = "Tlaquiltenango",
                   cve_edo = "17",
                   geocoded_datasets = z,
                   zoom = 15,
                   status_caso = c(1, 2),
                   week = c(1:lubridate::epiweek(Sys.Date())),
                   alpha = 0.2,
                   static = TRUE,
                   map_type = "satellite")
```



## [Situación Epidemiológica del Dengue en Tlaquiltenango]{style="color:#003300;" .r-fit-text}
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:#330019;background-color:#330019">

```{r}
load("/Users/fdzul/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-Personal/proyects/geocoding_mex/2024/8.RData/denmex_2024.RData")

z <- z |>
    sf::st_as_sf(coords = c("long", "lat"),
                 crs = 4326) |>
    dplyr::mutate(ESTATUS_CASO = ifelse(ESTATUS_CASO == 1,
                                        "Probable",
                                        "Confirmado"))

edo <- rgeomex::AGEM_inegi19_mx |>
    dplyr::filter(CVE_ENT == 17) |>
    dplyr::filter(NOMGEO == "Tlaquiltenango")

z <- z[edo,]
confirmados <- z |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == "Confirmado")
probables <- z |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == "Probable")

serotype_1 <- z |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == "Confirmado") |>
    dplyr::filter(DENGUE_SER_TRIPLEX == 1)
serotype_2 <- z |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == "Confirmado") |>
    dplyr::filter(DENGUE_SER_TRIPLEX == 2)
serotype_3 <- z |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == "Confirmado") |>
    dplyr::filter(DENGUE_SER_TRIPLEX == 3)
serotype_4 <- z |>
    dplyr::filter(ESTATUS_CASO == "Confirmado") |>
    dplyr::filter(DENGUE_SER_TRIPLEX == 4)

##############
mapview::mapview(probables,
                 col.regions = "#898F9C",
                 color = "white",
                 layer.name = "Probables") +
    mapview::mapview(confirmados,
                     col.regions = "#4267B2",
                     color = "white",
                     layer.name = "Positivos") +
    mapview::mapview(serotype_3,
                     col.regions = "#E01E5A",
                     color = "white",
                     layer.name = "DENV-3") 
```
